Package com.google.gwt.gears.client.httprequest

HttpRequest support for the Google Gears API for GWT.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ProgressHandler Fires as data is transferred.
RequestCallback Called when a pending HttpRequest completes normally.
 

Class Summary
HttpRequest The HttpRequest API implements a subset of the W3C XmlHttpRequest specification, and makes it available in both workers and the main HTML page.
HttpRequestUpload Used for monitoring the progress of an upload.
ProgressEvent Encapsulates the information associated with an upload in progress.
 

Package com.google.gwt.gears.client.httprequest Description

HttpRequest support for the Google Gears API for GWT.

The HttpRequest API implements a subset of the W3C XmlHttpRequest specification, and makes it available in both workers and the main HTML page.
